meanings.sent1: The inedited document contained many errors.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the inedited version of the story.
meanings.sent3: The inedited essay was a mess of misspelled words.
meanings.sent4: His inedited speech was raw and emotional.
meanings.sent5: The inedited photograph captured the true essence of the moment.

meanings.sent1: The inedited photo showed the scene exactly as it was.
meanings.sent2: The inedited contract was legally binding.
meanings.sent3: The inedited recipe turned out to be a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her inedited thoughts were pure and unfiltered.
meanings.sent5: The inedited video revealed the unaltered truth.
